properties.name: componentInitialState
properties.description: A state that will be assigned to the actual component contained by the wizard.
properties.rawdescription: A state that will be assigned to the actual component contained by the wizard.

properties.name: id
properties.description: The id parameter identifies the particular wizard and can be used to refer to it when hooking wizard entries. Example: "wizardId".
properties.rawdescription:
The id parameter identifies the particular wizard and can be used to refer to it when hooking wizard entries.
Example: "wizardId".

properties.name: onClose
properties.description: The event that is emitted when the wizard is closed.
properties.rawdescription: The event that is emitted when the wizard is closed.

properties.name: onReset
properties.description: The event that is emitted when the wizard is reset.
properties.rawdescription: The event that is emitted when the wizard is reset.

properties.name: onSelect
properties.description: The event that is emitted when the wizard entry is selected.
properties.rawdescription: The event that is emitted when the wizard entry is selected.
